title: saraswathi nannepuDu
sahitya:
sarasvati nannepuDu callaga jUDavamma

anupallavi

vara vINA pustakamula vadalaka dhariyincina shrI

caraNam

nIdu vAkkuvalana nikhila lOkamulaku vEda vEdAntamula nosagi brOcitivi nAdu 
manamu nanneppuDu nilacigAdu vanucu nI pAdamulanu nammiti gOpAladAsa pOSiki ikanu
